EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Lenny, No problem at all, believe me I understand the time constraints of having phone appointments! I will have an email to you shortly with additional information. I did ask around and here is a list of current MBO pharmaceutical clients: PfizerHoffmann-La Roche, Inc.Schering- MerckAstraea Therapeutics, LLC Companies we are in talks with: Johnson &JohnsonBristol Myers Squibb Thanks Lenny!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com">sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed.
